ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering book XXXIII
ygData.msgSnippet: The plans have been posted on www.eqportal.com/tinkering... You can keep your info to yourself if you like, we don t need it from you. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The plans have been posted on www.eqportal.com/tinkering...
You can keep your info to yourself if you like, we don't need it from you.

At 11:21 AM 11/01/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: GoodSmritn@...
>
>In a message dated 10/31/99 8:51:53 AM Eastern Standard Time,
>sdorsey@... writes:
>
><< From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>
>
> You may want to stop as you are throwing a LOT of plat away. I have found
> book XXXIII and it has:
>
> Aqua Lung
> Re-Breather (Aqua Lung with a longer duration)
> GemCutter (Not sure what it is, but I think Jewelers will be happy with
> us!)
>
> I *WILL* be giving out the formulas, but I wanted to make some of the items
> to sell first. I do have a 'deal' if anyone wants the formulas early. I
> want to make these items, but I'm low on cash and need a money backer. If
> someone is willing to back me, I'll give them the formula, but with the
> costs of even trying it, it will need a LOT of cash. I plan on releasing
> all of them no later then December 1st (basically a month).
>
> I sent pages 1 and 2 to Gnomad to prove I have the book (and he can post it
> if he likes, it only shows one part of what you need. I do not suggest just
> throwing things into our toolbox, it uses items that are NOT tinker items
> (like fireworks used batwings) so you will never just guess it.
>
> Estimated costs are about 200 for aqualung, about 500 - 600 for the
> rebreather, and I'm not sure on the GemCutter as it needs a part I have
> never seen or heard of, but I think about 100-200 plat.
>
> And GNOME, these things are expensive! Especially the rebreather.
> >>
>MAN ARE YOU EVER SO LAME...What's the sence of you even posting? .....Nobody
>is going to fund your stuff unless you give them the recipie before
>hand.......Also tinkering levels so slow that thier may be only a handfull
>of people that probly could tinker that high and you could be setting your
>self up for such a low demand...because the less people know about them the
>less they want them...low supply and high demand is a good thing ,but you
>have people that are stingy in this game...IF you dont have others in the
>market for comparison shopping you can't have people deciding that your sell
>price is good....and they will wait longer to buy your wears...unless you
>have a long line of desprate people waiting for it that dont know how to shop
>around...Which isnt very likely. Until a REAL post that does something that
>it says it does comes along I wont believe you and most likely evry one else
>wont .. ... Graphics can be manipulated in pictures submitted you know. Just
>like that supposed flying machine .... Sincerely Cloverleaf <Fennin Ro
>Server>
>
>
Madix/Atinky/Wildipus
Wizard, Rogue, and Warrior Sons of Mama Grizzletoss
100% Gnomish
